bindings_test.comment: Ensure host headers are on all sites

webconfig_test.comment: Ensure 'request_limits_max_url' is 'less than or equal' to '4096'
Ensure 'request_limits_max_query' is 'less than or equal' to '2048'

applicationpool_test.comment: Ensure 'application_count' is 'less than or equal' to '1'

registry_test.comment: Server - Ensure 'DisabledByDefault' is 'Windows: Registry Value' to '1'
